name: Basketball
description: A large, inflatable ball used in the game of basketball.

name: Soccer ball
description: A ball used in the game of soccer, typically made of leather or synthetic materials.

name: Volleyball
description: A ball used in the game of volleyball, typically made of synthetic leather or rubber.

name: Rugby ball
description: An oval-shaped ball used in the game of rugby, typically made of leather or synthetic materials.

name: Tennis ball
description: A small, lightweight ball used in the game of tennis, typically made of rubber and covered in felt.

name: Golf ball
description: A small, hard ball used in the game of golf, typically made of plastic or rubber with a dimpled surface.
